column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We went with a work group and Terry was our waiter and he was awesome!!  The food and drinks were great. Wide variety of options on the menu
column2: enough to keep our people with vegetarian and keto diets happy. Everything we got was delicious.  We got the bosscat fries
column10: and baby broccoli. The fried oysters and Brussels sprouts were favorites of our group.
